data.text:
@EnginingINNCafe @SaltireOfTruth @endisnear22 And again, Putin's logic and your blind beliefs. And meantime hundreds of innocent people die.
You prefer to believe 10 people from your government than the whole world. Where is the logic? https://t.co/DPFHLQi4wL

@EnginingINNCafe @SaltireOfTruth @endisnear22 Putin manipulats information so great that people trust each lie he creates. Why do you think all independent media in Russia are closed right now? Why do you thing police arrests every russian who says a word "war"? https://t.co/qWhWSsx52T

@EnginingINNCafe @SaltireOfTruth @endisnear22 It's what Putin created to have a strategy to indave terrotories and look for russians as a hero. Ukraine is since 1993 an independent country, and since then there were no killings, nothing. There were always people from Russia in Ukraine, not only in Donbas, and it was okay!
@SaltireOfTruth we're common people locked up in room with armed psychopath and the 'civilized world' holds the door yelling: 'defeat him or die there!', but the fascist is me

@MarryLu911 @SaltireOfTruth @endisnear22 But ukrainians are killing many russian people in Donbass for over 8 years
Putin became angry because he is provoked by this
And why no one do not talking about this in Europe, America and, because it is unprofitable for NATO? 
What is our fault?

@SaltireOfTruth @endisnear22 Of course not, my friend. Wenn Russia occupies ukrainian territory and kills ukrainian people since 2014, Ukrainians just react and go fighting russsians that come to their towns and homes. They do not invade Russia or kill russians in their country or elsewhere, right?
